scripts.generateTypes: typechain --target=web3-v1  --out-dir ../app/src/typechain ./artifacts/contracts/assetSide.sol/AssetSide.json && copyfiles --flat -V ./artifacts/contracts/assetSide.sol/AssetSide.json ../app/src/typechain && typechain --target=web3-v1  --out-dir ../app/src/typechain ./artifacts/contracts/cashSide.sol/CashSide.json && copyfiles --flat -V ./artifacts/contracts/cashSide.sol/CashSide.json ../app/src/typechain && typechain --target=web3-v1  --out-dir ../app/src/typechain ./artifacts/contracts/assetFaucet.sol/AssetFaucet.json && copyfiles --flat -V ./artifacts/contracts/assetFaucet.sol/AssetFaucet.json ../app/src/typechain
